member.name: T:SmartAssembly.Attributes.DoNotCaptureAttribute
member.summary: When added to any type (class, enum, interface, or struct), prevents that type's fields from being included in error reports.

member.name: T:SmartAssembly.Attributes.DoNotCaptureVariablesAttribute
member.summary: Prevent variables from being included in error reports.

member.name: T:SmartAssembly.Attributes.DoNotEncodeStringsAttribute
member.summary: Exclude the member from Strings Encoding.

member.name: T:SmartAssembly.Attributes.DoNotMoveAttribute
member.summary: Prevent the method from being moved to another type if Method Parent Obfuscation is turned on. Note that a method with any attribute is automatically excluded from moving.

member.name: T:SmartAssembly.Attributes.DoNotMoveMethodsAttribute
member.summary: Prevent all methods in the class from being moved to another type if Method Parent Obfuscation is turned on.

member.name: T:SmartAssembly.Attributes.DoNotObfuscateAttribute
member.summary: Exclude the member from obfuscation.

member.name: T:SmartAssembly.Attributes.DoNotObfuscateControlFlowAttribute
member.summary: Do not apply Control Flow Obfuscation.

member.name: T:SmartAssembly.Attributes.DoNotObfuscateTypeAttribute
member.summary: Exclude the type definition, as well as all the type's members from obfuscation.

member.name: T:SmartAssembly.Attributes.DoNotPruneAttribute
member.summary: Exclude the type definition from pruning.

member.name: T:SmartAssembly.Attributes.DoNotPruneTypeAttribute
member.summary: Exclude the type definition, as well as all type's members, from pruning.

member.name: T:SmartAssembly.Attributes.DoNotSealTypeAttribute
member.summary: Do not seal the type. This overrides the option to automatically seal all possible classes.

member.name: T:SmartAssembly.Attributes.EncodeStringsAttribute
member.summary: If Strings Encoding is turned on in options, revert the effect of set on a parent member.

member.name: T:SmartAssembly.Attributes.ExcludeFromMemberRefsProxyAttribute
member.summary: Turn off References Dynamic Proxy for this member.

member.name: T:SmartAssembly.Attributes.ForceObfuscateAttribute
member.summary: Force element to be obfuscated, even if it was excluded by safety mechanisms. Takes precedence over !

member.name: M:SmartAssembly.Attributes.ForceObfuscateAttribute.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Force element to be obfuscated, even if it was excluded by safety mechanisms. Takes precedence over !
member.param: If true, uses MD5 hash of a method name prefixed with "_". Otherwise, uses default Name Mangling setting.

member.name: T:SmartAssembly.Attributes.ObfuscateControlFlowAttribute
member.summary: Turn on control flow obfuscation. This overrides the control flow obfuscation level set in the SmartAssembly project.

member.name: T:SmartAssembly.Attributes.ObfuscateNamespaceToAttribute
member.summary: Force the type to be in a chosen namespace.

member.name: M:SmartAssembly.Attributes.ObfuscateNamespaceToAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Force the type to be in a chosen namespace.
member.param: Name of the namespace the type should be in.

member.name: T:SmartAssembly.Attributes.ObfuscateToAttribute
member.summary: Force the type or field to be renamed to a chosen name. Only rename methods if Advanced Renaming Algorithm is used.

member.name: M:SmartAssembly.Attributes.ObfuscateToAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Force the type or field to be renamed to a chosen name. Only rename methods if Advanced Renaming Algorithm is used.
member.param: Name to rename the type or field to.

member.name: T:SmartAssembly.Attributes.ReportExceptionAttribute
member.summary: Report any unhandled exception, which occurs in this method. This is useful for DLLs because it saves you catching exceptions yourself and passing the exceptions to SmartAssembly.

member.name: T:SmartAssembly.Attributes.ReportUsageAttribute
member.summary: Increment feature usage counter each time the method is ran. By default, the method's name is used for the feature name.

member.name: M:SmartAssembly.Attributes.ReportUsageAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Increment feature usage counter each time the method is ran. By default, the method's name is used for the feature name.

member.name: M:SmartAssembly.Attributes.ReportUsageAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Increment feature usage counter each time the method is ran. By default, the method's name is used for the feature name.
member.param: The supplied string is used for the feature name.

member.name: T:SmartAssembly.Attributes.StayPublicAttribute
member.summary: Ensure the member remains public after obfuscation. When SmartAssembly obfuscates some members, they may become internal. This can stop other applications from post-processing the obfuscated code.

member.name: T:SmartAssembly.Attributes.ForwardWhenMergedAttribute
member.summary: When a member must be visible to external assemblies (like plugins) after merging, SmartAssembly creates an embedded assembly forwarding calls to the members marked with this attribute from the original to the merged location.
